VIOS/IVM recovery

We backup these on a VIOS server

ItemDescriptionScriptLocation
mksysbContains device drivers and things specific to the system./usr/local/scripts/mksysb.sh/mksysb-images/ on mksysbhost
profdataPowerVM LPAR definitions./usr/local/scripts/mksysb.sh/mksysb-images/profdata on mksysbhost
viosbrVirtual IO devices and config/usr/local/scripts/mksysb.sh/mksysb-images/profdata on mksysbhost

Recovery

  • If recovery is on a IVM, Restore the profile data from prodfdata backup
  • Restore VIOSBR using viosbr command.

** Reset Server Name and Serial number in NVRAM

  • This makes IVM Accessable 
    ifconfig en0 <ip> netmask <up>
  • Open a browser window to the VIO server 
     http://taprvioX

    Where X is the name of the VIO server

  • Select View/Modify System properties from the left side menu nd update the system name - example Server-7998-61X-SN100AACA and click on eth APPLY button to save your entry
